meanings.sent1: The cat is nonactive during the day, preferring to nap in the sun.
meanings.sent2: She felt nonactive after a long day at work and just wanted to relax on the couch.
meanings.sent3: The nonactive squirrel decided to take a break from gathering nuts and watch the other animals play.
meanings.sent4: The nonactive volcano seemed peaceful, but deep down, it was ready to erupt at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The nonactive bear in the zoo looked content lounging in the shade.

meanings.definition: Not currently in use or operation.
meanings.sent1: The nonactive computer had been sitting in the corner for months without being turned on.
meanings.sent2: The old factory had many nonactive machines that were once used for production.
meanings.sent3: The nonactive phone buzzed with notifications, but its screen remained dark and silent.
meanings.sent4: The nonactive fountain in the park was a reminder of better days when it used to flow with water.
meanings.sent5: The nonactive car in the garage needed a jump start to get back on the road.

meanings.definition: Not participating or involved in a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: The nonactive student sat quietly at the back of the class, not raising a hand to answer questions.
meanings.sent2: The nonactive member of the team rarely contributed to group projects.
meanings.sent3: The nonactive audience member yawned and checked their phone during the entire performance.
meanings.sent4: The nonactive player on the bench watched the game unfold without joining in the action.
meanings.sent5: The nonactive volunteer didn't show up for the event, leaving the organizers short-handed.
